bug.author: bouthilx
bug.summary: Simultaneous addition and deletion of HP breaks EVC
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mgermain>@mgermain</denchmark-link> script failed to detect a deletion of hyperparameter. There was both an addition and a deletion at the same time. The adapters only contained the addition. Perhaps this was because the deleted hyperparameter was still present but now constant (config in a yaml file, with HP now constant instead of orion~prior().
